description:
A plane carrying drugs and a wanted woman crashes into Ryo`s apartment which forces him and Kaori to sleep on the same bed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Revival of the Funny Pair! The Beauty Fallen from the Sky
Mei Combi Daifukkatsu! Sora kara Maiorita Bijo
迷コンビ大復活! 空から舞いおりた美女
